AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented alien: individual being smuggled, involved in a case of reckless endangerment and resulting death during smuggling
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.nine undocumented aliens: group of nine undocumented immigrants being smuggled from Mexico to the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.seven other undocumented aliens: additional group of seven undocumented immigrants being smuggled from Mexico to the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.nineteen undocumented aliens: total number of undocumented immigrants in the group, involved in a case of reckless endangerment and resulting death during smuggling, transported in an extended cab pickup truck for financial gain, lacking proper food supplies and insulated clothing, facing severe weather conditions including low temperatures and potential rain, with inadequate water and food provisions
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez: deceased undocumented female alien, died from heat stroke due to the harsh conditions during the smuggling journey
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero: guide for the group of undocumented aliens, transported them for financial gain and created a substantial risk of death or serious bodily injury, defendant, used emergency call box to request assistance during an unexpected snowstorm, provided inadequate advice on journey length and provisions
